subject: Street Sense (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The trainer Larry Jones was not giving away any secrets when he said Hard Spun would try to lead all the way in today’s Kentucky Cup Classic at Turfway Park. But this time he hopes Hard Spun will be able to hold off Street Sense and reverse the order of finish in the Kentucky Derby.
